data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Fehér, Zoltán, Deli, Tamás, Erőss, Zoltán P., Lika, Romilda (2019): Taxonomic revision of the subterranean genus Virpazaria Gittenberger, 1969 (Gastropoda, Spelaeodiscidae). European Journal of Taxonomy 558: 1-25, DOI: https://doi.org/10.5852/ejt.2019.558|112 occurrences
